alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:22AM CDT until June 15 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR EASTERN FILLMORE COUNTY... At 422 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lanesboro, or 8 miles east of Preston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Fillmore County, including the following locations... Henrytown, Choice, Old Barn Campground, Isinours, Hutton, Greenleafton and Peterson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
